definition: a stranger in a strange land (from a poem by Wang Wei 王維|王维[Wang2 Wei2])
pinyin: du2 zai4 yi4 xiang1 wei2 yi4 ke4

definition: (located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
